text: Anita Louise Fremault (or just Anita Louise; January 9, 1915 â€“ April 25, 1970) was an American television actress who also starred in movies. She played the gentle mother in the television series My Friend Flicka. Her movies included A Midsummer Night's Dream, Madame Du Barry, Marie Antoinette and The Sisters. She was especially popular in the 1930s. Fremault was born in New York City. She died in Los Angeles resulting from a stroke at age fifty-five. title: Anita Louise
